column4: friend: wirless adapter for the computer or a wireless repeater/access ;point?
It is a USB wireless adapter called Linksys Wusb11 v2.8
It seems to work out of the box(wifi radar and network manager detect my networks)
IT detects the networks, and Wifi Radar says I'm connected to my network, but I can't access the internet! In Windows on the same network I can
